- Location: Kitchen sink cabinet; white PVC P-trap and drain assembly visible.  
- Drain fittings: White PVC P-trap with slip joints; appears dry with no active leak.  
- Dishwasher drain hose: White corrugated hose connected directly to drain line; no air gap or visible high loop.  
- Recommendation: Install an air gap or create a proper high loop and secure the hose to underside of counter.  
- Additional note: Loose electrical cord/wiring on cabinet floor; keep dry and organized. No obvious corrosion or leaks seen.
